SELECT art.article_id, art.user_id, art.article_title, art.article_add_time, art.article_centext, art.article_good_number, art.article_look_number, art.article_collection_number, art.article_type_id, u.user_name, arttype.article_type_name
FROM t_article AS art LEFT JOIN `t_article_type` AS arttype ON art.article_type_id = arttype.article_type_id LEFT JOIN `t_user` u ON u.user_id = art.user_id WHERE art.article_id = #{articleId}

SELECT art.article_id, art.user_id, art.article_title, art.article_add_time, art.article_centext, art.article_good_number, art.article_look_number, art.article_collection_number, art.article_type_id, u.user_name, arttype.article_type_name
FROM t_article AS art LEFT JOIN `t_article_type` AS arttype ON art.article_type_id = arttype.article_type_id LEFT JOIN `t_user` u ON u.user_id = art.user_id
and art.article_title like concat('%', #{articleTitle}, '%')
ORDER BY art.article_add_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_article (user_id, article_title, article_centext, article_type_id, article_add_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{articleTitle}, #{articleCentext}, (SELECT article_type_id FROM t_article_type WHERE article_type_name = #{articleTypeName}), #{articleAddTime});
